overview: They might be fresh-faced and doe-eyed, but that doesnt mean for one moment that the boys in this fabulous offering from Young & Restless dont know what they like as the likes of Shane Hirch, Joshua Levy and Yuri Adamov are only too happy to demonstrate. Believe us, youre gonna love every single second of this wild, twink-inspired debauchery; as one smooth beauty after the next surrenders his hairless pucker to some of the biggest schlongs in the biz. The result is exactly the kind of bareback fuckathon that will linger long in the memory; with asses left gaping and dripping with jizz. No question about it, if this doesnt get you unloading multiple times then we very much doubt theres anything that will!

production_companies.name: Orrange Media Group: Young and Restless

title: Young Butts Loving Big Cocks
